room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: Fun theme, mostly traditional puzzles, some a bit cliche if you have done many escape rooms. The final puzzle is a geek-fest!

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: I usually don't write reviews too often but we really loved it! The staff is super friendly and we had tons of fun! We can't wait to go back again. We talked about it the whole car ride home.We didn't know what to expect either. But honestly, that's the BEST part! Thank you Breakout Waikiki! Hawaii needed something like this

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: Great experience!! Definitely going back to do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: Met these guys from kc also. Awesome people, great concept! !!

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: Completed the room with six of my co-workers. The Hatch room was a great time! Would definitely like to come back for another challenge.

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: Super intense yet super fun!!! I would definitely recommend Breakout Waikiki to anyone looking for a great time!

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: This place is absolutely amazing! We didn't really know what to expect but had very high hopes for this place and it exceeding everything we thought it would be. The staff is super friendly and the room "hatch" was puzzling but so much fun. I will definitely be returning again. Ahhhh we were so close to breaking out haha

room_title: Escape room "The Hatch" by Breakout Waikiki in Honolulu
review: My husband and I did a Breakout tonight and we absolutely loved it - I would highly recommend it to anyone with a sense of adventure who likes to figure things out. The mental stimulation and adrenalin from 57 minutes of solving the puzzles left us buzzing for hours afterward (and feeling ecstatic that we had actually broken out!) - we still can't stop talking about it. The staff was super cool and the experience had all kinds of ingenious, clever, and unexpected turns. Would definitely do it again!
